title: In case of fire. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Stresses that heat, smoke and poisonous gases are the elements that can kill in a fire. Outlines ways in which to avoid fire hazards in the home. Shows what to do should a fire break out in the house or apartment building when occupied.
